member.name: T:Obout.Ajax.UI.Design.ExtenderControlBaseDesigner`1
member.summary: Designer support for adding and navigating to page methods

The designer here has two main jobs:
1) Modifying the properties of the TargetProperties objects to remove the "TargetControlID" property and add the Control converter. We remove "TargetControlID" because the value will be hanging off of the target control's properties already so it's confusing/redundant. 2) Modifying the name of the Extender property so it's user-configurable.

member.name: T:Obout.Ajax.UI.ExtenderControlBase
member.summary:
This is the main class for extenders. It has several main jobs:
1) It performs the hookup between an Extender (server) control and the behavior it instantiates 2) It manages interacting with the ScriptManager to get the right scripts loaded 3) It adds some debugging features like ValidationScript and ScriptPath

member.name: M:Obout.Ajax.UI.ExtenderControlBase.EnsureScripts
member.summary: Walks the various script types and prepares to notify the ScriptManager to load them. 1) Required scripts such as ASP.NET AJAX Scripts or other components 2) Scripts for this Extender/Behavior

member.name: M:Obout.Ajax.UI.ExtenderControlBase.FindControlHelper(System.String)
member.summary:
This helper automates locating a control by ID.
It calls FindControl on the NamingContainer, then the Page. If that fails, it fires the resolve event.
member.param: The ID of the control to find

member.name: T:Obout.Ajax.UI.TreeView.Tree
member.summary:
A hierarical control can be used to display tree of nodes.
The OboutTree control supports the following features,
Node population using databinding from various datasources.
Asynchronous node population on demand
Drag and Drop Support
Key board and RTL Support
Editing Support
Key board and RTL Support
Additional node data can be attached to nodes
Best performance support
